column3: All modified code is covered by existent tests. For example: [CService::GetKey()](https://people.freebsd.org/~vd/pr19360_567f98ea5_coverage/src/netaddress.cpp.gcov.html#731).

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
Updated to use `CNetAddr::GetAddrBytes()`, see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19031#issuecomment-656691574 for longer explanation.\n\nNow this PR is even simpler.

Thanks for reviewing!

> The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
>    -- Jonas Salk

So, the next one for review is at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19534 :-)
I like `auto`, but if this is critical code, maybe it would be prudent to use the explicit `std::vector<unsigned char>` type.
This should be updated to use the new `AsBase<>` syntax from #19503 if that PR gets merged first.
